saao/saa15/P313420
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ DI-mu a-na ma-a-ti {URU}bi-ra-a-te ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ŠA₃-bu ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ lu DUG₃.GA-šu₂ {KUR}x+x x x ša x ERIM-MEŠ rak-ku-bu-ti ša BAD₃-{1}ku-ri-gal-zi ina x x ana-ku TA x-MEŠ du-nu ša {URU}x+x-ra-a-ni bu x x-šu₂-nu ša 2-me ERIM-MEŠ-ni ša x x x+x x x+x-x-ia ni-kit-ti ina pa-ni-šu₂-nu x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x i-tal-ku i-x x+x x ma-a UN-MEŠ x x x x ig-du-ru ina bat-te o am-me-te ša ID₂ it-tal-ku ma-a mi-nim-mi-ni ina bat-ti an-ni-te ša ID₂ la re-e-he ṭe₃-e-mu ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ a-se-me ma-a LUGAL ka-ri-im il-lak TA {1}aš-šur-U-LAL-in a-di ŠA₃-bi {URU}da-ar-x at-tal-ka ina ŠA₃-bi a-se-me ma-a LUGAL be-li₂ uk-ku-uš a-su-hur a-na EN.NUN-ia at-ta-lak o
